titleStmt.title: An ansvver to Mr. John Dury his letter which he writ from the Hague, to [brace] Mr. Thomas Goodwin. Mr. Philip Nye. Mr. Samuel Hartlie. Concerning the manner of the reformation of the church, and answering other matters of conseqvence. And King James his judgement concerning the Book of Common Prayer. / Written by a Gentleman of tried integrity.
titleStmt.author: Robinson, Henry, 1605?-1664?
